Organics:  "Fine.  Let's quit wasting time then."
Injustice:  What do you want me o do with the male?"
Unircon: "Take him to CR and do a minimal repair and low his energy 
level, in a way that he will easy to handle. After that lock him 
down... In the higest segurity cell"
Injustice:  "You got it.  Come on, lover boy," the clone says as he 
picks up WIndlord and hauls him out to the Medical bay.
Organics:  "Just make sure he is taken care of.  Or no help." the 
valkyire spat out defiantly.
Unicron: "Of course"said the hologram"He's part of our deal... Now, 
do your part..."
Organics:  "Right.  Where is this computer room, so we can get this 
over with."
Unicron: "Darkfate... show her quartes, inside them is the computer. 
If you behave, Organics, I may let you visit your boyfriend and tell 
him that now he have to work for me"
Organics:  "Fine."  She then turns to Darkfate.  "Let's go.  NOW."
Injustice:  He drags the male into the med lab and throws him in a 
CR chamber and locks it down and programs it for most immediate 
repairs only.
Windlord: Internal repairs ended quickly, and Cr reported that all 
works was done
Injustice:  The clone pulls Windlord out and the carries him into 
Malice's former room and throws him on the bed.  The walls are sill 
torn to shreds, something that is fairly amusing to him.
Windlord: "What?? where am I?"said the male weakly and stunned, he 
tried to move and he noticed that still he was tied
Injustice:  "You are in Malice's old room.  Get used to it, you'll 
be here a while."
Windlord: "WHAT?"said Windlord, and with bravely he said"Where's 
Organics??? what have you doen to her???"
Injustice:  "She is fin, and will remain that way as long as you 
behave like a good little boy."
Windlord: the male didn't like to do something foolish so he decided 
not do somthing that could annoy Injustice, and said "where's she?"
Injustice:  I believe she is going to the computer labs to track 
down Malice so we can kill him, that was our reason for going down 
there."
Windlord: "WHAT???? she couldn't... do that... she won't allow 
it"said the male
Injustice:  "Well, she's a bounty hunter, so I imagine that she 
can.  Kinda funny don't you think?  Family killing family..."
Windlord: Windlord didn't answered for a while, after that he could 
said "WHY? I won't belive that she can do that... no after all she 
was willing to find his brother..."
Injustice:  "You mean there is anothe brother?  Ha, this is funnier 
and funnier!  WHo is this poor moron?"
Windlord: "I didn't mean that"replied the male"I just can't belive 
that she help you tofind Malice and let him die..."
Injustice:  "hmm, so tell me, is there another brother?"
Windlord: "is ther another borther, he isn't part of 
this... "replied the male
Injustice:  "He most certainly is now!  WHO IS HE?!?" he yells, 
grinning maniaclly.
Windlord: Windlord remained in silence
Injustice:  "Yu aren't behaving, do I have to beat the name out of 
you?"
Injustice:  "You're lying!  I know it!  WHO IS HE?!?"
Windlord: the male didn't said anything and closed his eyes
Injustice:  he clone growls and grabs Windlord by the neck.  "Tell 
me or I'll wring your neck!"
Windlord: Windlord tried to breath but he couldn't but he seemn't 
willing to say anything about
Injustice:  He gets real mad and throws Windlord into the wall 
closeby and walks out so he doesn't kill him.  "He will talk, I'll 
get tha name..."
Windlord: Windlord did a deep breath and he felt that he was in hot 
waters, but he still felt worried about Organics and doubts crossed 
his mind. If he only had more energy andhad his hands free...
Organics:  Taps foot impatiently.  "Hello?  Are you going to take me 
somewhere or stand here, fool" she yells at Darkfate.
Darkfate: "Don't press your luck"snarled the male, while he started 
to lead her towards her quartes that insideit was the computer that 
would help to find the fugitives
Organics:  Follows with her arms crossed over her chest.  "I want to 
see Windlord now, I want to make sure that freak hasn't hurt him."
Darkfate: "Just if the master allowed "replied the male
Organics:  "Grrr.... fine, whatever.  let's just get this over 
with."  She walks over to the computer console and begins typing in 
commands, and lookinng up to the screen she begins her search.
Darkfate: "Then... As you can watch"said the male "Inside this room, 
you have your quarters ant the computer where you can work... Since 
you don't need me, I leave you work but remember that always"
Darkfate: after a paus the male added "always someone it's watching 
you "
Organics:  "..."  She continues her search, generalizing the search 
area and narrowing specific areas with complex search criteria.  She 
work for a long time, slowly making som progress.
Darkfate: The male left the femme and the quarters' door closed, he 
walked ramdomly and found Injustice "Why are you so mad? its the 
birdbot giving problems?"
Injustice:  "He said there is another brother, and won't relinquish 
the name!  I want that name!"
Darkfate: "We can't hurt him by now... But Unicron would found this 
interesting... where di you left him?"
Injustice:  "In Malice's former quarters, he's locked in there."
Darkfate: "Good"said the male"But, we should take extra 
precautions... Follow me "
Injustice:  "Where to?  Where are we going?"
Darkfate: "To visit the parrot... I want to be sure that he couldn't 
get a comlink with anyone"
Darkfate: The male walked towars Windlord's quarters
Injustice:  He follows Darkfate back to Windlord's prison and 
unlocks the door.  "Look alive you have a visitor." 
Windlord/darkfate: Windlord looked tired and confused, Darkfate 
walked closely and shot a dart. Windlord didn't delay to fell 
sleep. "Nice"said Darkfate"Now hold it... I need his hand free in 
order to work"
Injustice:  He walks over and unties the prisoner's hands and holds 
one behind his back while handing one up o Darkfate.
Darkfate: "good"muttered the Male, it was the hand where the comlink 
was instaled and he started to work with some mini tools"It's 
done"said after a while"Left him in the bed, I guess that he's so 
weak that  ghe won't able to move by himself... but some extra 
precautions always are needed"
: Injustice:  With that done, Injustic hefted Windlord up and tossed 
him onto the bed.  "Right, lets get out of here and get some 
energon."
Darkfate: The male nodded and left the room 
Injustice:  Left the room and locked the door, then headed with 
Darkfate to the mess hall.
Darkfate: "I would like to do the same with the femme"muttered 
Darkfate"I no trust her"
Injustice:  "Heh, don't worry about her, she'll do whatever we tell 
her if it means keeping her boyfriend alive."
Darkfate: "Extra precautions always are needed"said the male"with 
the thing that I did to the parrot, he could get a com link with his 
fellows Maximals and incase that he could scape we could track 
him... 'cause I installed a secret device that will allow us that... 
due that we have to find the way to do the same with the lady "
Darkfate: "Ojhhh how fooolish"said the male "I wana mean that he 
couldn't get a con link with his fellows, I jammed his comlink"
Injustice:  "That will prove most difficult.  We can barely handle 
her by herself, w need o find a way to do i to her when she doesn't 
expect something.  W need her to slep or something, then do it."
Darkfate: "We should wait the right moment"said the male "she 
doesn't have to know what happened or who hit her... by now, we just 
care about our energon"
 Injustice:  "Exactly.  So let's go and get som, i need it to heal 
some of my injuries."
Darkfate: the male laughted, "So the parrot was giving you 
problems??? I tought that you had decreased his energy levels to 
minimal"
Injustice:  "You don't need o be at full power to be annoying..." 
the clone grumbled.
Darkfate: "So"said the male while he took a glass of energon and sit 
down"What did the parrot to annoy you?"
 Injustice:  "Exactly.  So let's go and get som, i need it to heal 
some of my injuries."
Darkfate: the male laughted, "So the parrot was giving you 
problems??? I tought that you had decreased his energy levels to 
minimal"
Injustice:  "You don't need o be at full power to be annoying..." 
the clone grumbled.
Darkfate: "So"said the male while he took a glass of energon and sit 
down"What did the parrot to annoy you?"
Injustice:  "I asked him a few questions, then he said something 
about a second brother, and he would not talk about him.  I could 
not drag it out of him, that was what was so annoying."
Darkfate: "And very brave..."said the male "He may be useful to 
Unicron, after all, and I may suggest you something, Malice?? "
